channel.title: Composer on Anthony Lepki
channel.description: Recent content in Composer on Anthony Lepki

item.title: Drupal 8 Composer Drush
item.description: My notes for installing Drupal 8 on localhost (MAMP/Docker/VM/other) with Composer while using the power of Drush. By no means is this a definitive guide, simply a working document to outline steps in process. You’ll get the majority of the goods here: Installing Drupal 8 Installing Drupal w/ Composer Listed here: https://www.drupal.org/docs/develop/using-composer/using-composer-to-manage-drupal-site-dependencies#creating-new Drupal Composer config generator (drupal-init) We’re going to try Option C on above link hussainweb/drupal-composer-init
